dcterms:creator: Thomas Emerson
dcterms:description: The dataset includes training, testing, and validation data for Chinese sentence processing, consisting of approximately 860,000 segmented Chinese sentences.
dcterms:title: SIGHAN 2005 Competition for Chinese sentence processing

dcterms:creator: Rui Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset includes 16,548 sentences with positive sentiment and 18,574 sentences with negative sentiment, sourced from Chinese online shopping, movie, and book reviews.
dcterms:title: Sentiment Analysis Dataset

dcterms:creator: Linqing Liu
Yao Lu
Ye Luo
Renxian Zhang
Laurent Itti
Jianwei Lu
dcterms:description: This dataset includes user information and corresponding comments from Sina Weibo accounts, totaling 31,980 comments, manually labeled for troll detection.
dcterms:title: Troll Detection Dataset
